pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:1.1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmiṃ nigrodhārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:1.1.2: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarena kumbhakārena bhikkhū pavāritā honti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:1.1.4: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū na mattaṃ jānitvā bahū patte viññāpenti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:1.1.5: Yesaṃ khuddakā pattā te mahante patte viññāpenti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:1.1.6: Yesaṃ mahantā pattā te khuddake patte viññāpenti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:1.1.7: Atha kho so kumbhakāro bhikkhūnaṃ bahū patte karonto na sakkoti aññaṃ vikkāyikaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ kātuṃ,
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:1.1.10: “kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā na mattaṃ jānitvā bahū patte viññāpessanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:1.1.11: Ayaṃ imesaṃ bahū patte karonto na sakkoti aññaṃ vikkāyikaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ kātuṃ,
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:1.1.13: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhū tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:1.1.14: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:1.1.15: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhū na mattaṃ jānitvā bahū patte viññāpessantī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:1.1.16: Atha kho te bhikkhū te anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:1.1.17: saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhū na mattaṃ jānitvā bahū patte viññāpentīti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:1.1.20: kathañhi nāma te, bhikkhave, moghapurisā na mattaṃ jānitvā bahū patte viññāpessanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:1.1.22: vigarahitvā dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:1.1.23: “na, bhikkhave, patto viññāpetabbo. Yo viññāpeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:1.2.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa bhikkhuno patto bhinno hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:1.2.2: Atha kho so bhikkhu—“bhagavatā paṭikkhittaṃ pattaṃ viññāpetun”ti kukkuccāyanto na viññāpeti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:1.2.5: “kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā hatthesu piṇḍāya carissanti, seyyathāpi titthiyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:1.2.6: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhū tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:1.2.7: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:1.2.8: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:1.2.9: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, naṭṭhapattassa vā bhinnapattassa vā pattaṃ viññāpetun”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:1.3.1: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū—“bhagavatā anuññātaṃ naṭṭhapattassa vā bhinnapattassa vā pattaṃ viññāpetun”ti appamattakenapi bhinnena appamattakenapi khaṇḍena vilikhitamattenapi bahū patte viññāpenti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:1.3.2: Atha kho so kumbhakāro bhikkhūnaṃ tatheva bahū patte karonto na sakkoti aññaṃ vikkāyikaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ kātuṃ,
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:1.3.5: “kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā na mattaṃ jānitvā bahū patte viññāpessanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:1.3.6: Ayaṃ imesaṃ bahū patte karonto na sakkoti aññaṃ vikkāyikaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ kātuṃ, attanāpi na yāpeti, puttadārāpissa kilamantī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:1.3.7: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhū tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:1.3.8: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:1.3.9: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū appamattakenapi bhinnena appamattakenapi khaṇḍena vilikhitamattenapi bahū patte viññāpessantī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:1.3.10: Atha kho te bhikkhū chabbaggiye bhikkhū anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:1.3.11: “saccaṃ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, appamattakenapi bhinnena appamattakenapi khaṇḍena vilikhitamattenapi bahū patte viññāpethā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:1.3.14: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, appamattakenapi bhinnena appamattakenapi khaṇḍena vilikhitamattenapi bahū patte viññāpessatha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:1.3.16: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:1.3.17: “Yo pana bhikkhu ūnapañcabandhanena pattena aññaṃ navaṃ pattaṃ cetāpeyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:1.3.18: Tena bhikkhunā so patto bhikkhuparisāya nissajjitabbo.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:1.3.19: Yo ca tassā bhikkhuparisāya pattapariyanto so tassa bhikkhuno padātabbo— ‘ayaṃ te, bhikkhu, patto yāva bhedanāya dhāretabbo’ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:2.1.6: patto abandhano vā ekabandhano vā dvibandhano vā tibandhano vā catubandhano vā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:2.1.20: Sace lāmakaṃ pattaṃ adhiṭṭheti— “mahagghaṃ pattaṃ gahessāmī”ti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:2.1.22: Tena bhikkhunā saṃghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā vuḍḍhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:2.1.23: “ayaṃ me, bhante, patto ūnapañcabandhanena pattena cetāpito nissaggiyo.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:2.1.28: yo na chandāgatiṃ gaccheyya, na dosāgatiṃ gaccheyya, na mohāgatiṃ gaccheyya, na bhayāgatiṃ gaccheyya, gāhitāgāhitañca jāneyya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:2.1.31: Yācitvā byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṃgho ñāpetabbo—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:2.1.33: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ pattaggāhāpakaṃ sammanneyya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:2.1.37: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno pattaggāhāpakassa sammuti, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:2.1.45: Sace thero gaṇhāti, therassa patto dutiyassa gāhetabbo.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:2.1.46: Na ca tassa anuddayatāya na gahetabbo. Yo na gaṇheyya, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:2.1.49: Yo ca tassā bhikkhuparisāya pattapariyanto, so tassa bhikkhuno padātabbo— “ayaṃ te, bhikkhu, patto yāva bhedanāya dhāretabbo”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:2.1.50: Tena bhikkhunā so patto na adese nikkhipitabbo, na abhogena bhuñjitabbo, na vissajjetabbo— “kathāyaṃ patto nasseyya vā vinasseyya vā bhijjeyya vā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:2.1.51: Sace adese vā nikkhipati abhogena vā bhuñjati vissajjeti vā, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:2.2.1: Abandhanena pattena abandhanaṃ pattaṃ cetāpeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:2.2.2: Abandhanena pattena ekabandhanaṃ pattaṃ cetāpeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:2.2.3: Abandhanena pattena dvibandhanaṃ pattaṃ cetāpeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:2.2.4: Abandhanena pattena tibandhanaṃ pattaṃ cetāpeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:2.2.5: Abandhanena pattena catubandhanaṃ pattaṃ cetāpeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:2.2.6: Ekabandhanena pattena abandhanaṃ pattaṃ cetāpeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:2.2.7: Ekabandhanena pattena ekabandhanaṃ pattaṃ cetāpeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:2.2.8: Ekabandhanena pattena dvibandhanaṃ pattaṃ cetāpeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:2.2.9: Ekabandhanena pattena tibandhanaṃ pattaṃ cetāpeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:2.2.10: Ekabandhanena pattena catubandhanaṃ pattaṃ cetāpeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:2.2.11: Dvibandhanena pattena abandhanaṃ pattaṃ cetāpeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:2.2.26: Abandhanena pattena abandhanokāsaṃ pattaṃ cetāpeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:2.2.45: Abandhanokāsena pattena abandhanaṃ pattaṃ cetāpeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:2.2.50: Catubandhanokāsena pattena abandhanaṃ pattaṃ cetāpeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
